[tmp name=RECONFIG_STATUS send=1][reconfigure][/tmp] [reconfig-wait] [if scratch possible_timeout] [L]WARNING: Reconfiguration may have timed out[/L].
[L]Last config[/L]: [reconfig-time] [else] [L]SUCCESS[/L], config time [file name=`"etc/status.$Config->{CatalogName}"`] [value name=ui_changes_made set=""] [/else] [/if] ([L]return[/L])
